autorecipes

Source: vignettes/autorecipes.Rmd
autorecipes.Rmd
library(autorecipes)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'autorecipes'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     units
library(magrittr)

Usage

Set of example recipes

recipebook <- RecipeBook_example

recipes(recipebook) %>% head()
#> # A tibble: 6 × 4
#>   index names                                            ingredients fav  
#>   <int> <chr>                                            <list>      <lgl>
#> 1     1 Akoori Eggs with Spinach & Potato                <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 2     2 Crispy Duck with Fava Beans & Caramelised Onions <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 3     3 Chicken with Rosemary Plumns                     <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 4     4 Chickpea & Sweet Potato Masala                   <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 5     5 Gaucho Steaks with Chimichurri Salad             <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 6     6 Chipotle Bean Taco Salad                         <Ingrdnts>  FALSE

Set your favourite recipes

favourites(recipebook) <- 1:3

recipes(recipebook) %>% head()
#> # A tibble: 6 × 4
#>   index names                                            ingredients fav  
#>   <int> <chr>                                            <list>      <lgl>
#> 1     1 Akoori Eggs with Spinach & Potato                <Ingrdnts>  TRUE 
#> 2     2 Crispy Duck with Fava Beans & Caramelised Onions <Ingrdnts>  TRUE 
#> 3     3 Chicken with Rosemary Plumns                     <Ingrdnts>  TRUE 
#> 4     4 Chickpea & Sweet Potato Masala                   <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 5     5 Gaucho Steaks with Chimichurri Salad             <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 6     6 Chipotle Bean Taco Salad                         <Ingrdnts>  FALSE

Create a meal plan

meal_plan(recipebook) <- create_meal_plan(
  recipebook, 
  fav_only = TRUE
)

meal_plan(recipebook)
#> # A tibble: 14 × 3
#>    day   meal   recipe_index
#>    <fct> <fct>         <int>
#>  1 Mon   Lunch             1
#>  2 Mon   Dinner            3
#>  3 Tues  Lunch             3
#>  4 Tues  Dinner            2
#>  5 Wed   Lunch             1
#>  6 Wed   Dinner            2
#>  7 Thurs Lunch             2
#>  8 Thurs Dinner            3
#>  9 Fri   Lunch             3
#> 10 Fri   Dinner            1
#> 11 Sat   Lunch             2
#> 12 Sat   Dinner            3
#> 13 Sun   Lunch             2
#> 14 Sun   Dinner            2
